basics.name: Emerson Quijada Rafael
basics.label: Computer Science Graduate | Full Stack Developer (Java/Angular)
basics.summary: Computer Science Graduate and Systems Engineering student. Developer with experience in backend (Java, Spring Boot, SQL Server) and frontend (Angular, Astro). Specialized in creating scalable web applications through microservices architectures and cloud-native technologies (AWS, Docker). Passionate about integrating DevOps practices (CI/CD, automation) to optimize the development cycle. Seeking opportunities as a Junior Developer where I can contribute innovative technical solutions and continue growing professionally.

work.name: Calzados La Peruanita
work.summary: Designed and implemented a complete sales and inventory system for a footwear store, using Angular, Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL. The system allows managing products, colors, sizes, sales, orders, and invoicing, with deployment on Vercel and Render.
highlights: Backend development with Spring Boot and PostgreSQL
Frontend design and development with Angular
Hierarchical inventory management: product → color → size
Sales, invoicing, customers, and reports modules

work.name: Alarcon Lozano Ingenieros
work.summary: Provided technical support for hardware, software, and networks, handling fault diagnosis and resolution, preventive maintenance, and system backups. Also generated detailed reports on the status of equipment and computer systems.
highlights: Hardware and software fault diagnosis and resolution
Technical report writing on system issues
Network support, router configuration, and connectivity

work.name: Lan Center Batlenet
work.summary: Supported the installation, maintenance, and technical support of computer equipment. Provided direct customer service, resolving incidents in real-time and collaborating in technology inventory management.
highlights: Technical user support and incident resolution
Structured cabling and local connectivity support

aptitudes: Technical support in hardware and software
Spring Boot and REST API development
Unit testing with JUnit and Mock

education.area: IT Technical Support Specialist, Information Technology

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Web system for managing book loans and returns in libraries, developed as an academic project. Implemented with Spring Boot and MySQL, it allows registering books, users, and controlling loan history in real-time.
highlights: Book registration and search by title, author, or category
Loan control, returns, and late penalties
User and role management (librarian and reader)
Developed with Spring Boot (backend) and MySQL

projects.name: Importaciones DEN
projects.description: E-commerce built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for an imported clothing store.

projects.name: Licorería E&R
projects.description: Premium liquor e-commerce developed with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, including shopping cart system and payment gateway
highlights: Product catalog with filters and search

projects.name: API REST Todo App
projects.description: Task management application developed with Spring Boot and Angular, implementing REST architecture

projects.description: Page with images and scrolling with water effect, tests were done with gsap
